# Schema: `PurgeLineageRequest`

Request to delete lineage edges older than a specified number of days.

- Type: `object`
- Required fields: `older_than_days`

## Properties

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `older_than_days` | `integer` | `true` | Delete lineage edges older than this many days. |
